mainBoard.name: Demon's Disciple
mainBoard.originalText: When Demon's Disciple enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.

rulings.text: As the triggered ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then each other player in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures and/or planeswalkers are sacrificed at the same time.
Demon's Disciple can be the creature sacrificed for its own ability.

mainBoard.name: Demonic Gifts
mainBoard.originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

rulings.text: The reanimating effect of Demonic Gifts works only once. Once the creature dies and returns to the battlefield, it’s a new object with no relation to the creature it was. If that new creature dies, it won’t come back.
